name: Battle-chat
body:
Battle Chat ============= Battle Chat is an unofficial Battlelog chat [application for Android devices running 4.0+ and onward] (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ninetwozero.battlechat). Author ------------ **Karl Lindmark**
Web: http://www.ninetwozero.com
E-mail: karl@ninetwozero.com
Google+: [+KarlLindmark](https://plus.google.com/+KarlLindmark)
Twitter: [@karllindmark](https://www.twitter.com/karllindmark)
GitHub: [@karllindmark](https://www.github.com/karllindmark)
LinkedIn: [ninetwozero](http://www.linkedin.com/in/ninetwozero)
Supporting coders ------------ **Peter Miklosko**
E-mail: peter.budo@gmail.com
Google+: [+PeterMiklosko](https://plus.google.com/+PeterMiklosko)
Twitter: [@peter-budo](https://www.twitter.com/peter-budo)
GitHub: [@peter-budo](https://www.github.com/peter-budo)
LinkedIn: [petermiklosko](http://www.linkedin.com/in/petermiklosko)
Designers ------------ **Benjamin Humphrey** (New design)
Google+: [Benjamin Humphrey](https://plus.google.com/104703796076849938233)
Web: http://www.humphreybc.com
Twitter: [@humphreybc](https://www.twitter.com/humphreybc)
**Stephen Beaudet** (Logo)
Google+: [+StephenBeaudet](https://plus.google.com/+StephenBeaudet)
Twitter: [@dbagjones](https://www.twitter.com/dbagjones)
Miscellaneous efforts ------------ **Alexander Lindström** (Q&A)
Web: http://www.xanderapps.com
Twitter: [@a_lindstroem](https://www.twitter.com/a_lindstroem)
**Alexander Stillesjö** (Q&A)
Web: http://www.stillesjo.org
Twitter: [@stillesjo](https://www.twitter.com/stillesjo)
**Daniel Peukert** (Czech translation)
Web: http://www.danielpeukert.cz
Google+: [+DanielPeukert](https://plus.google.com/+DanielPeukert)
Twitter: [@dapil](https://www.twitter.com/dapil)
GitHub: [@dapil](https://github.com/dapil)
**Gustav Karlsson** (Q&A)
Web: http://www.gustavkarlsson.se
Google+: [+GustavKarlsson](https://plus.google.com/GustavKarlsson)
### Special thanks To all the people that have helped out by testing, providing feedback and/or anything else helpful. Much appreciated. :-)
